> vpidaparthi wrote:
> 
>> I am completely a novice to JFCUnits. Here is my question.
>> Is it possible to write JFCUnits without intruding into the actual
>> code we are testing? How? 

Don't use JFCUnit, use Jemmy - it's much simpler. It allows you to find
components based on a number of different criterions. In fact you can even
write your own (it uses the Strategy pattern for this).

Cheers, Ilja
